name: Ninja Shoot Fruit AR
description:
Shoot fruits, don’t let fruits come to you – the most addictive Augmented Reality Game - Fruit Shoot Ninja action!
We’ve placed fruits wherever you go, so don’t let them catch you and shoot them! Best shooting game!
The game is completely free, just install and start shooting Ninja Fruit.
Challenge yourself and see how long you can last before a Ninja Fruit catches you, set a high score and simply practice your shooting fruit skills . Want more fun? Take a break and experience a new way to shoot your favourite fruit.

It’s the first on it’s kind, this shooting game is using AR technology. So install to live the perfect experience while shooting fruits instead of slicing them!

That’s not all though - give yourself the edge by logging in every day and be rewarded with daily prizes, including rare blades and dojos that you can use in other game modes!

There has never been a better time to play Ninja Fruit, so unsheathe your gun and get ready for an addictive, action-packed gaming experience!
